bad planning

i want this new Sona skin, but i know ill never play it.... :(

and i love the ori skin and will play that because its on par with winter wonder.

I feel like I need that key icon to go with my name...
love the skins, love the champs, love the icons. Happy valentines :) {{summoner:31}} {{item:3151}}

I apologise if this is ignorant as hell, I try to keep up with the posts here in OCE, and I'm pretty sure this is my first time posting, does anyone know why the Orianna skin isn't on sale for 975 like the 1350 skins usually are? This also happened with the Lunar Wraith Caitlyn skin. I know they changed around their sale methods but I don't recall this, anyone shed some light on why this is?
I love Ori so i'm a bit disappointed it's not just the regular 975 price
At the end of last year, Riot announced that they wouldn't be offering the 975 RP sale for 1350 RP skins. So you'll have to buy the skin at the set price now.
Ah, that's a big shame. Things are just getting more and more expensive. I spose from now on I should wait for them to go on sale. That's too bad :/
We changed the discounts up late last year and the complete post with all the details can be found here http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts :)
Thank you very much, I just read the "early sale will replace launch discounts" I don't know how I managed to skip that, thank you very much

Damnit! I was hoping the bouquet of roses ward skin would come up for sale again.  Does anyone know if they re-release limited release ward skins like they do with the legacy vault for character skins?
Alrighty, when can i stop starving myself for RP? Riot pls stop this. :(
